programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Freight Line Feud
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho work to clear the name of a man who is accused of robbing freights in order to force a woman's freighting company out of business. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Colorado
programme.desc: Theres trouble out west! Its the Civil War and the Union needs troops back east to defend itself. Roy Rogers stars as Lieutenant Jerry Burke, who is sent to investigate why the returning troops are being stalled in Colorado. Also starring Gabby Hayes, Pauline Moore, and Milburn Stone, this film is action packed with a turn you wont see coming!

programme.title: Hurricane Horseman
programme.desc: Pancho Gomez kidnaps Don Roberto and his daughter, Tonita for ransom. Can an undercover lawman named Gun Smith save the pair, or will he be caught himself?! Smith gets a job in Gomez's camp supposedly to repair their guns. Instead he fixes the guns so they will misfire. When Gomez refuses to let him go, he sends his horse for the Sheriff! This campy western from 1931 stars Lane Chandler and is sure to keep you enthralled from beginning to end. Directed by Armand Schaefer; starring Marie Quillan and Walter Miller.

programme.title: Way of the West
programme.desc: Government agent Gordon (Hal Taliaferro) goes undercover to investigate an ongoing war between cattlemen and sheepmen. But he soon finds himself framed for murder! This low budget western from the short-lived Empire Pictures is from the golden era of shoot em ups, when audiences knew who the bad guys were, and couldnt wait for the good guys to serve up some just punishment!

programme.title: Sagebrush Trail
programme.desc: John Wayne plays a man wrongly convicted of murder in this exciting western drama from Lone Star Pictures. You'll enjoy plenty of gun action and thundering hoofbeats as he escapes from jail and then joins a gang, hoping to find the real killer! Director Armand Schaefer (The Miracle Rider, The Lost Jungle) whips up some fine performances from a cast of B-movie favorites, including Lane Chandler (Samson and Delilah) and the great stunt rider, Yakima Canutt. And of course, the film features plenty of fight scenes, made memorable by John Wayne's big swinging' right fist! For film buffs: This was one of 11 films Wayne starred in that year, making 1933 one of the busiest years of Wayne's...

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: Brother battles brother in this gritty tale of feuding ranchers in the old west. This story of the Texas panhandle stars such familiar faces as Robert Preston, Chill Wills, and Jack Elam, and was a rare film for its time in that it was filmed almost entirely in Texas with no studio interiors. If for no other reason, watch this one for Prestons performance. If you only know him from The Music Man or Victor Victoria, youre sure to be surprised here! (also, look for John Drew Barrymore as Jef Cloud. He was part of the famous Barrymore family, and father of Drew Barrymore.) Jim Strake: Frank Cordell. The Whip: Dave Kashner. Directed by George Templeton

programme.title: Hoppy Serves a Writ
programme.desc: Sheriff Hopalong Cassidy triumphs again in this lighthearted western romp from Harry Sherman Productions. Good ol' Hoppy (William Boyd) has to leave his beloved Texas to track down some bad guys in Oklahoma. You can bet that the action and suspense will follow Hopalong wherever he goes. Also, look for a number of familiar faces in the ast, including TV's future Superman George Reeves, notorious Hollywood heavy Victor Jory, and in his first credited role, Robert Mitchum! In fact, Mitchum would appear in more of Hoppy's adventures before branching out on his own and becoming one of Hollywood's greatest stars. Also featuring Jan Christy, Forbes Murray, Byron Foulger, Earle Hodgins, and Roy...

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: A love story and a search for gold in the Valley of Death! Dubbed simple, powerful and dramatic by the New York Times on the date of its release, Death Valley is indeed an elegant depiction of love and deception in the American desert during the Gold Rush. In what was to be the final film of famed silent film director Paul Powell (Polyanna), a cast of mostly unknown actors produces uniformly excellent work. Lyrical and graceful, Powells film spins the tale of a young boy who finds love and gold, only to have it stolen from him.

programme.title: Red Ryder: Roll, Thunder, Roll!
programme.desc: Red Ryder finds two silver conchas, the trademark of bandit El Conejo, at a raided ranch. He reports the raid to Marshal Bill Faugh but tells him that he suspects that El Conejo, a Robin Hood type character, is being framed.

programme.title: Revenge of the Virgins (Edited Version)
programme.desc: The angry and topless female members of a Native American prepare for battle when white treasure hunters move in on their sacred ground. Peter Perry Jr. (The Secret Sex Lives of Romeo and Juliet) directed this early nudie-cutie from a script by legendary cult filmmaker Ed Wood (Plan Nine from Outer Space). Writing under the pen name Peter LaRoche, Wood churned out this screenplay just before he reinvented himself as the author of seedy adult novels.

programme.title: The Fighting Redhead
programme.desc: When a rustler named Faro kills one of his own henchmen and blames it on Sheila O'Conner, Red and Little Beaver set out to clear Sheila and to find evidence against Faro and his gang.

programme.title: Hellgate (Edited Version)
programme.desc: In 1867 Kansas, veterinarian Sterling Hayden treats an injured stranger who turns out to have been a guerrilla raider--and Hayden soon finds himself serving a term in one of the world's most terrifying prisons under sadistic commandant Ward Bond. Adapted from the story of Dr. Mudd, the physician who attended John Wilkes Booth, assassin of President Lincoln.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 General Delivery
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In General Delivery, the G-men crack a government swindle. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Gypsy Traders
programme.desc: In Gypsy Traders, a band of gypsies settles down in the Montana Territory to take advantage of the copper stakes they've made in the region. In the nearby town of Bender, a group of shady locals believe the settlers should be stripped of their rights and take the matter to court. When it looks like the judge is going to rule for the gypsies, the outlaws kidnap him and lock him in the local jail.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Courtship of Floyd Smoot
programme.desc: Kate's intentions are mistaken when she tries to help Floyd Smoot regain his confidence after being slighted by the woman he loves, a bride he had ordered by mail! Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Floyd Smoot: Rafe Davis.Directed by Sherman Marks. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Please Buy My Violets
programme.desc: Kate is forced to peddle cologne when Uncle Joe buys a bunch of cases with the money meant for window screens.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 Phony Sheriff
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho get swindled by a fake cattle buyer. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 Uncle Disinherits Niece
programme.desc: A rancher is found murdered after he threatens to disinherit his niece. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Younger Brothers
programme.desc: Following their activity with the Quantrill Raiders, the Younger Brothers return on the scene to commit a bank robbery in Minnesota. Detectives Matt and Frankie work to put a stop to their plan. Starring Jim Davis, Mary Castle, George Wallace, Gregory Walcott, Louise Beavers, and Sheb Wooley. Directed by William Witney. Epsiode originally aired in 1954.Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 John Wesley Hardin
programme.desc: The notorious John Wesley Hardin kills two people while on a cattle drive to Abilene. Matt and Frankie head out to bring him to justice. Richard Webb stars as John Wesley Hardin. Also starring Jim Davis, Mary Castle, Howard Negley, Robert Karnes amd John Eldredge. Directed by William Witney. Episode originally aired April 9, 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.sub-title: S01 : E25 The Reformer
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, the Judge deals with a rigged election. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 The Runaway
programme.desc: A young boy runs away from home because he thinks his father is a coward for not standing up to his abusive boss. Jeff and Roy have to find the boy and convince him that his father is just doing what he has to do in order to provide for his family. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E25 Outlaw Mesa
programme.desc: Sam is framed by Duke and his gang, who have kidnapped Linda to prevent Sam from proving his innocence. Its up to Annie and Lofty to save Sam from an angry mob, save Linda from Duke and his gang, and take them down for their crimes. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 The Runaways
programme.desc: Annies younger brother finds himself in danger when he gets in trouble with The Shadow Gang after running away with a friend. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E39 Circle of Hate
programme.desc: Since the arrival of a Lt. Smith, members of the Iroquois tribe keep turning up dead. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper.Episode originally aired December 25, 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Hawkeye's Homecoming
programme.desc: Hawkeye learns that his brother has joined the British army and is now a redcoat. However, when he is murdered by a treacherous Indian companion, Hawkeye seeks revenge. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Dark Star
programme.desc: Little Joe Cartwright tries to help a gypsy girl who was abandoned by her people - because they believed she was a werewolf.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: The Gay Cavalier
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid, along with Pancho, try to help an unhappy bride.

programme.title: Boots and Saddles
programme.desc: When a young Englishman inherits a ranch, none other than Gene Autry takes up the challenge of turning the Brit into a real westerner. He convinces the Brit to use the ranch to raise horses, but things quickly grow complicated. Look for the usual cast of characters from Republic Pictures, including Smiley Burnette (as the irresistible Frog Millhouse!). Songs include Take Me Back To My Boots and Saddle, and Ridin the Range.

programme.title: Enemy of the Law
programme.desc: Tex Ritter stars in this western drama about a man who goes undercover to befriend a convict believed to have stolen a shipment of government gold. Also starring Guy Wilkerson as Panhandle Perkins, this offering from Hollywoods Poverty Row features the usual fistfights and entertaining storyline that made these modestly budgeted features well worth watching. Songs include Teach Me To Forget and You Will Have to Pay both sung by Tex!

programme.title: Cry Blood Apache (Edited Version)
programme.desc: An Apache brave seeks vengeance on a band of sadistic gold hunters in this bloody drive-in western. Pitcalin (Jody McRae) leads the marauders who wipe out an Apache camp when they discover gold, only to watch their violent deeds lead to their own demise. Featuring a superb cast that also includes Dan Kemp, Robert Tessier, and Joel McRae, this coldblooded western tale was directed by character actor and filmmaker Jack Starrett (Cleopatra Jones, The Losers).

programme.title: Colorado
programme.desc: Theres trouble out west! Its the Civil War and the Union needs troops back east to defend itself. Roy Rogers stars as Lieutenant Jerry Burke, who is sent to investigate why the returning troops are being stalled in Colorado. Also starring Gabby Hayes, Pauline Moore, and Milburn Stone, this film is action packed with a turn you wont see coming!

programme.title: The Trail Beyond
programme.desc: Rod Drew (John Wayne) is in search of a missing miner and his daughter in this Lone Star Picture. Along the way, Drew rescues his pal Wabbi (Noah Beery Jr.) from card cheats who have framed him for murder. You'll find plenty of action and suspense in this vintage horse opera, originally distributed by the kings of the B western, Monogram Pictures!

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: A love story and a search for gold in the Valley of Death! Dubbed simple, powerful and dramatic by the New York Times on the date of its release, Death Valley is indeed an elegant depiction of love and deception in the American desert during the Gold Rush. In what was to be the final film of famed silent film director Paul Powell (Polyanna), a cast of mostly unknown actors produces uniformly excellent work. Lyrical and graceful, Powells film spins the tale of a young boy who finds love and gold, only to have it stolen from him.

programme.title: High Lonesome
programme.desc: A young drifter is suspected of murder in this stirring production from writer/director Alan Le May (best known for writing The Searchers). John Drew Barrymore stars as Cooncat, a troubled young man who has to steal to survive. With no friends in West Texas, he falls in with some bad customers who involve him in some terrible crimes. The strong cast includes Chill Wills, Jack Elam, and John Archer, with cinematography by Oscar winner W. Howard Greene.

programme.title: Loser's End
programme.desc: This spine-tingling drama of the west stars Jack Perrin as a man out for revenge against an outlaw gang. Other stars include Tina Menard as the woman who helps him along the way, and Elias Lazoroff as the daring Don Carlos. Perrin (Jaws of Justice, The Apache Kid's Escape), was a familiar face in low budget westerns, his career spanning back to the silent era.

programme.title: The Terror of Tiny Town
programme.desc: Some incredibly small actors were hired to star in this peculiar cult film. It's all about the villainous Bat Haines (Little Billy Rhodes), who is wreaking havoc on Tiny Town. Can Buck Lawson (Billy Curtis) and the townspeople band together and drive him away? This oddity, which was originally distributed by Columbia Pictures, was directed by one of the most prolific low budget filmmakers in Hollywood history, Sam Newfield, a man with over 200 movies to his credit. While it has appeared on many Worst of all time lists, it deserves to be seen at least once!

programme.title: Son of the Renegade
programme.desc: Johnny Carpenter (who also wrote the screenplay) stars as Red River Johnny, a gunslinger returning to his home town to clear his name of some heinous accusations. This low budget howler was the only feature directed by Reg Brown, who was better known as an editor and a director of television shows. If Ed Wood directed a western, it might have looked like this one. Enjoy!

programme.title: Springtime in the Rockies
programme.desc: Gene Autry stars as a ranch foreman who helps a beautiful young ranch owner who faces the opposition of local ranchers after bringing a flock of sheep into cattle country. Along with the traditional title song, musical numbers include Youre the Only Star In My Blue Heaven, Buffalo Gals, and Give Me a Pony and an Open Prairie. This Republic Pictures gem includes the usual stock company of actors, with the matchless Smiley Burnette as Genes comical sidekick, Frog Millhouse. Directed by Joseph Kane; written by Gilbert Wright, Betty Burbridge; Also starring Polly Rowles, Ruth Bacon, and George Chesebro.

programme.title: Hellgate (Edited Version)
programme.desc: In 1867 Kansas, veterinarian Sterling Hayden treats an injured stranger who turns out to have been a guerrilla raider--and Hayden soon finds himself serving a term in one of the world's most terrifying prisons under sadistic commandant Ward Bond. Adapted from the story of Dr. Mudd, the physician who attended John Wilkes Booth, assassin of President Lincoln.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 Safe Crackers
programme.desc: In Safe Crackers, Pat and Stoney are ordered to break up a safe cracking gang preying on Colorado banks handling government silver bullion. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 Silver Fraud
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In this episode, the G-Men go to Denver to investigate a silver fraud. Starring Russel Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 The Ringer
programme.desc: Betty Jo must challenge the legendary Pixley Fats in the annual horseshoe tournament. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Kate's Recipe for Hot Rhubarb
programme.desc: Kate tries to teach Betty Jo how to make hot rhubarb after setting her up on a double date. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired November 12, 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 Water Rights
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho are falsely accused of robbing a stagecoach. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Boomerang
programme.desc: Two bandits impersonate Cisco and Pancho, sending the two to prison for robbery and murder. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951. It was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Joaquin Murietta
programme.desc: Matt and Frankie arrivein the California gold fields where Frankie is kidnapped by the infamous bandit Joaquin Murietta. Without his usualy partner, Matt enlists the help of Captain Harry Love. Starring Jim Davis, Mary Castle, and Robert Anderson. Look for Rick Jason as Murietta. Jason would later go on to star in the popular ABC war series Combat!

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Tiburcio Vasquez
programme.desc: Following the murder of a railroad agent, Matt and Frankie work to bring the vengeful Tiburcio Vasquez to justice. Starring Jim Davis, mary Castle,Anthony Caruso, Edward Colmas, Lillian Molieri, and Eddie Parker. Also, look for Glenn Strange as Sheriff Billy Rowland. Strange was known for playing Frankenstein's monster in several Universal pictures, as well as a recurring role on Gunsmoke. Also, Eddie Parker, who plays a trapper in this episode, was one of Hollywood's most revered stuntmen. Directed by William Witney. Epsiode oringinally aired in 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Slightly Prodigal
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, a woman arrives in town looking for her son. Roy checks around, and finds out that her son is not only in the area, but has become a notorious outlaw. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.sub-title: S01 : E28 Spirit of the Law
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West.In this episode, Judge Bean intervenes when two brothers accuse each other of crimes including cattle rustling. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 The Iron Smoke-Wagon
programme.desc: To everyones excitement, Boiler ODoul arrives in Diablo with the towns new steam fire engine. When the bank is robbed, Annie must think of a creative way to smoke out the criminals. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Trigger Twins
programme.desc: Annie faces off against dangerous twin sisters, Dana and Jana Matthews. Annie is fast with a gun, but is she fast enough to take on a duo known as The Trigger Twins? Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Threat
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook come across a group of settlers trapped in the Huron's territory.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Franklin Story
programme.desc: Hawkeye teams up with Benjamin Franklin to take down a tyrant.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingacchook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.sub-title: S01 : E32 Death at Dawn
programme.desc: After Farmer Perkins murders a store clerk in front of his wife, and is allowed to walk after his trial, the Cartwright's step in to make sure he'll be rearrested, tried, and hung.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Crashing Thru
programme.desc: Down the danger trail sweeps a crimson fury... as Renfrew rides again! In this action-packed adventure, Sgt. Renfrew must face off against a group of criminals involved in a gold robbery. With his partner, Constable Kelly, wounded in a gunfight, Renfrew must stop the thieves on his own. Directed by Elmer Clifton; starring James Newill and Warren Hull, this is one adventure you won't want to miss!

programme.title: Robin Hood of the Pecos
programme.desc: Roy Rogers finds himself elected sheriff in a wild Texas town after the Civil War. But can Roy handle a place under martial law? And can he save Gabby Hayes from being executed? And how many songs will he get to sing? Clear the burrs from your saddle and get ready for a good one, also starring Marjorie Reynolds, plus Sally Payne as Belle Starr, Queen of the Oklahoma Outlaws!

programme.title: Song of Arizona
programme.desc: This Roy Rogers adventure finds Gabby Whitaker (Gabby Hayes) running a ranch for wayward boys. One of the boys uses stolen money to help Gabby pay off his debts, but things unravel when the boys father, a notorious outlaw named King Blaine, is murdered; the rest of the Blaine gang show up at Gabbys looking for the loot! Director Frank McDonald works with a fine cast, including Dale Evans, Lyle Talbot, and of course, Roys beloved horse Trigger.

programme.title: Tumbleweeds
programme.desc: The great William S. Hart stars in this classic tale of settlers in the Oklahoma territory. Directed by King Baggot, one of the most versatile movie figures of the silent era, this movie is not only history recorded in heart throbs, as the original print ads boasted, but shows us why Hart is considered by some to be the top western actor of them all. Hart, who directed many of his own films, also had a hand in directing this feature, which turned out to be his last starring role.

programme.title: Way of the West
programme.desc: Government agent Gordon (Hal Taliaferro) goes undercover to investigate an ongoing war between cattlemen and sheepmen. But he soon finds himself framed for murder! This low budget western from the short-lived Empire Pictures is from the golden era of shoot em ups, when audiences knew who the bad guys were, and couldnt wait for the good guys to serve up some just punishment!

programme.title: The Dawn Rider
programme.desc: John Wayne was still a few years from major stardom when he appeared as John Mason, a man seeking revenge for his fathers murder. Marion Burns stars as Alice, Masons love interest, while Reed Howes stars as Masons friend and rival for Alices affection. When Mason finally tracks down the man responsible for his fathers death, will Ben help, or stand in his way? Produced by Lone Star Pictures, the group behind many of Waynes early films, The Dawn Rider is a stirring yarn about the price of vengeance.

programme.title: Street Kings
programme.desc: Gdy dowody sugerują, że doświadczony glina z Los Angeles brał udział w egzekucji innego policjanta, posądzony musi postąpić wbrew policyjnemu etosowi, którego przestrzegał przez całą karierę.

programme.title: Czas zabijania
programme.desc: Stare nawyki ciężko wykorzenić... Zwłaszcza na zmieniającym się południu USA. Carl Lee Hailey, pracownik fabryki w Mississippi dowiaduje się tego, gdy jego dziesięcioletnia siostra zostaje brutalnie napadnięta przez dwóch pijanych rasistów.

programme.title: Miłość i inne używki
programme.desc: Anne Hathaway gra rolę Maggie, urzekającej wolnej duszy, która nie pozwoli niczemu, a zwłaszcza bardzo trudnemu osobistemu wyzwaniu na ograniczanie jej. Jednakże kobieta spotyka Jamiego Randalla, którego rolę gra Jake Gyllenhaal.

programme.title: Klub samotnych mam
programme.desc: Grupa samotnych matek z różnych środowisk łączy się i tworzy grupę wsparcia, gdzie mogą omówić swoje problemy, znaleźć radość w przeszkodach życiowych i wykorzystać swoją wewnętrzną siłę, aby pokonać osobiste wyzwania.

programme.title: Mały wielki wojownik
programme.desc: Chiny, 227 p.n.e. Liang bierze do niewoli generała, by zdobyć nagrodę, a między nimi rodzi się nieoczekiwana więź.

programme.title: Intersections
programme.desc: Małżeństwo spędzające miesiąc miodowy w Maroku przeżywa śmiertelny wypadek samochodowy na środku pustyni.

programme.title: Life or Something Like It
programme.desc: Po przeprowadzeniu wywiadu z bezdomnym jasnowidzem, który mówi jej, że jej życie nie ma sensu i za kilka dni się skończy, reporterka postanawia zmienić swoje postępowanie.

programme.title: Komedia romantyczna
programme.desc: Dziwaczne umysły autorów Strasznego Filmu rozszarpują na strzępy gatunek komedii romantycznej w filmie KOMEDIA ROMANTYCZNA – produkcji dla ludzi, którzy kochają ten gatunek i dla tych, którzy go nienawidzą.

programme.title: Wielkodupy pająk
programme.desc: Kiedy potężny atak wojskowy kończy się niepowodzeniem, zespół naukowców i jeden sprytny eksterminator muszą zabić stworzenie, zanim miasto zostanie zniszczone.

programme.title: Meet Dave
programme.desc: Szukając sposobu na uratowanie swojego skazanego na zagładę świata, załoga maleńkich, wyglądających jak ludzie kosmitów przybywa na Ziemię w idealnym przebraniu - statku kosmicznym w kształcie zwykłego człowieka.

programme.title: Dziecko z piekła rodem
programme.desc: Spodziewająca się potomka para zamieszkuje w starej, nawiedzonej posiadłości. Wkrótce wzywają egzorcystów z Watykanu, by ochronili ich przed demonicznym, nienarodzonym dzieckiem.

programme.title: Silver Spoon
programme.desc: Nawet kula nie zatrzyma prawdziwego bohatera. Pełnometrażowa kontynuacja głośnego serialu z Pawłem Prilunnym.

programme.title: Mały wielki wojownik
programme.desc: Chiny, 227 p.n.e. Liang bierze do niewoli generała, by zdobyć nagrodę, a między nimi rodzi się nieoczekiwana więź.

programme.title: Czerwony Duch
programme.desc: Grudzień, 1941 rok. Grupka sowieckich żołnierzy próbuje dotrzeć do swoich towarzyszy. W walce pomaga im pół-człowiek, pół-duch.

programme.title: Przyjaciel do końca świata
programme.desc: Gdy asteroida zbliża się do Ziemi, mężczyzna zostaje sam po tym, jak jego żona odchodzi w panice. Postanawia wyruszyć w podróż, aby spotkać się z ukochaną z liceum. Towarzyszy mu sąsiad, który nieumyślnie utrudnia mu realizację planu.

programme.title: Elektra
programme.desc: Pełna akcji opowieść oparta na popularnym komiksie Marvela z Jennifer Garner w roli Elektry – wojowniczej zabójczyni toczącej ostateczną bitwę między dobrem a złem.

programme.title: Intersections
programme.desc: Małżeństwo spędzające miesiąc miodowy w Maroku przeżywa śmiertelny wypadek samochodowy na środku pustyni.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Acrimony
programme.desc: Wierna żona jest rozwścieczona krętactwami swego męża, gdy staje się jasne, że ją zdradził.

programme.title: Guess Who
programme.desc: Theresa przedstawia rodzicom narzeczonego, Simona Greena, lecz nie ostrzegła ich o jednym drobiazgu: jest biały. Próbując doprowadzić do zerwania, Percy Jones pokazuje, że ojciec nie zawsze ma rację.

programme.title: U Pana Boga W Ogródku
programme.desc: Do Królowego Mostu trafia najgorszy z absolwentów szkoły policyjnej. Jednocześnie miejscowość ta zostaje wybrana na azyl dla świadka koronnego w procesie mafii.

programme.title: Miłość i inne używki
programme.desc: Anne Hathaway gra rolę Maggie, urzekającej wolnej duszy, która nie pozwoli niczemu, a zwłaszcza bardzo trudnemu osobistemu wyzwaniu na ograniczanie jej. Jednakże kobieta spotyka Jamiego Randalla, którego rolę gra Jake Gyllenhaal.

programme.title: Przyjaciel do końca świata
programme.desc: Gdy asteroida zbliża się do Ziemi, mężczyzna zostaje sam po tym, jak jego żona odchodzi w panice. Postanawia wyruszyć w podróż, aby spotkać się z ukochaną z liceum. Towarzyszy mu sąsiad, który nieumyślnie utrudnia mu realizację planu.

programme.title: Don't Say a Word
programme.desc: Nowojorski psychiatra zostaje zmuszony do terapii niestabilnej pacjentki o burzliwej przeszłości, aby odzyskać wolność dla uprowadzonej córki.

programme.title: Kaligula
programme.desc: Dramatyzacja dotycząca dojścia do władzy Cezara i późniejszego panowania Kaliguli, jednego z najsłynniejszych przywódców starożytnego Rzymu.

programme.title: Lustra
programme.desc: Zdesperowany, aby zjednoczyć swoją rodzinę i poukładać sobie życie Ben Carson podejmuje się pracy jako nocny ochroniarz spalonego domu handlowego w Mayflower.

programme.title: Czas zabijania
programme.desc: Stare nawyki ciężko wykorzenić... Zwłaszcza na zmieniającym się południu USA. Carl Lee Hailey, pracownik fabryki w Mississippi dowiaduje się tego, gdy jego dziesięcioletnia siostra zostaje brutalnie napadnięta przez dwóch pijanych rasistów.

programme.title: Ślepy traf
programme.desc: Richie student na Uniwestytecie w Princeton jest przekonany, że został oszukany. Udaje się on na Kostarykę, aby zmierzyć się z magnatem kasyna online Ivanem Blockiem.

programme.title: Martwe oceanarium
programme.desc: Pracownicy akwarium u wybrzeży południowej Kalifornii zostają otoczeni przez nieumarłe stworzenia morskie, gdy w budynku pojawia się tajemniczy wirus.

programme.title: House of the Witch
programme.desc: Grupa licealistów postanawia zrobić psikusa opuszczonemu domowi z okazji Halloween. Po wejściu do środka padają ofiarą demonicznej wiedźmy, która ściąga na nich swój gniew.

programme.title: I Can Quit Whenever I Want
programme.desc: Trzech pogrążonych w niełasce nauczycieli akademickich zamienia się w handlarzy narkotyków po tym, jak jeden z nich tworzy nową eksperymentalną pigułkę...

programme.title: Wielkodupy pająk
programme.desc: Kiedy potężny atak wojskowy kończy się niepowodzeniem, zespół naukowców i jeden sprytny eksterminator muszą zabić stworzenie, zanim miasto zostanie zniszczone.

programme.title: Komedia romantyczna
programme.desc: Dziwaczne umysły autorów Strasznego Filmu rozszarpują na strzępy gatunek komedii romantycznej w filmie KOMEDIA ROMANTYCZNA – produkcji dla ludzi, którzy kochają ten gatunek i dla tych, którzy go nienawidzą.

programme.title: Krokodyl Dundee II
programme.desc: Mick Dundee i Susan prowadzą szczęśliwe życie w Nowym Jorku. Kłopoty zaczynają się, gdy były mąż kobiety dostarcza jej dowody przeciwko przywódcy kartelu narkotykowego.

programme.title: Pushing Tin
programme.desc: Nick Falzone jest kontrolerem ruchu lotniczego numer jeden, dopóki do wydziału nie zostaje przeniesiony tajemniczy nieznajomy, Russell Bell. Rywalizacja pomiędzy dwoma najlepszymi kontrolerami ruchu lotniczego w nowojorskim TRACON-ie eskaluje do potencjalnie niebezpiecznego poziomu.

programme.title: Monolit
programme.desc: Podczas wyprawy do Los Angeles matka z synem doznają poważnego wypadku, przez który zmuszeni są walczyć o przetrwanie.

programme.title: Niepoczytalna
programme.desc: Młoda kobieta opuszcza swoje rodzinne miasto, aby uciec przed niespokojną przeszłością i rozpocząć nową pracę. Kiedy mimowolnie oddaje się instytucji psychiatrycznej, staje przed największym strachem - ale czy to prawda, czy tylko złudzenie?
